product_name: Royal Robbins Essential Stripe T-Shirt - Women's
long_description: For your next big adventure, pack the women's Essential Stripe T-Shirt from Royal Robbins. The wrinkle-resistant, fast-drying shirt feels as comfy as a tee and offers slimming style. Blended fabric offers UPF 50+ sun protection and easy-going 2-way stretch. Flattering styling includes an empire waist, double-layer front panels with gathers, and flat side panels for a slimming fit. Women's Essential Stripe T-Shirt from Royal Robbins features a real crossover neckline.
short_description: For your next big adventure, pack the women's Essential Stripe T-Shirt from Royal Robbins. The wrinkle-resistant, fast-drying shirt feels as comfy as a tee and offers slimming style.
